title: Futura Extra Light or Ultra Light?
content:
Hello  
Does anyone know where I could buy extra-light or ultra-light/hairline weights of Futura?  
I've looked around and couldn't find anything.  
If this doesn't exist somewhere, I would think there would be a potential demand for more weights of Futura, wouldn't there?

Thanks
author: BrooklynRob

comments.content:
Here: http://www.myfonts.com/PurchaseOptions?id[]=116325  
and here: http://www.myfonts.com/PurchaseOptions?id[]=116901

Note that numbers and spacing is different in SH version.
